#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
# define ll long long
using namespace std;

ll a[19]={0};

int main()
{
   ll t,n,sum,x;
   scanf("%lld",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
      scanf("%lld",&n);
      int i=n;sum=1;x=1;
      while(i>2)
      {
         x*=i;
         if(n%2==0)
         {
            if(i%2==0)
               sum-=(x);
            else
               sum+=(x);
         }
         else
         {
            if(i%2==0)
               sum+=x;
            else sum-=x;
         }
         //cout<<sum;
         i--;
      }
      if(n>=2)
      cout<<abs(sum)<<endl;
      else
         cout<<0<<endl;
   }
   return 0;
}
